welcome.title: Welcome to Inmobi
welcome.description: Welcome to your real estate dashboard! Let's take a quick tour to help you get started.

addProperty.title: Add Your First Property
addProperty.description: Start by adding your first property listing. Our wizard will guide you through every step.

search.title: Property Search
search.description: Browse properties with advanced filters. Find exactly what you're looking for with our smart search.

messaging.title: Messaging Center
messaging.description: Communicate directly with clients and other agents. Keep all conversations organized in one place.

calendar.title: Calendar & Tours
calendar.description: Schedule property tours and manage your availability. Sync with Google Calendar for seamless organization.

analytics.title: Analytics & Reports
analytics.description: Track your performance with detailed analytics. Monitor views, inquiries, and conversion rates.

admin.title: Admin & Team
admin.description: Manage your team, permissions, and agency settings. Control who can access what features.

settings.title: Settings & Preferences
settings.description: Customize your experience with notifications, language, and account settings.

welcome.title: Property Wizard
welcome.description: Welcome to the Property Wizard! This step-by-step guide will help you create a professional property listing.

basicInfo.title: Basic Information
basicInfo.description: Start with the essential details: property title, type, and location. This information appears first in search results.

pricing.title: Pricing & Details
pricing.description: Set competitive pricing and add key details that buyers look for. Include bedrooms, bathrooms, and square footage.

features.title: Features & Amenities
features.description: Highlight what makes your property special. Select amenities that will attract the right buyers.

images.title: Photos & Media
images.description: High-quality photos are crucial for attracting buyers. Upload clear, well-lit images of all rooms and key features.

description.title: Description
description.description: Write a compelling description that tells the story of your property. Include neighborhood highlights and lifestyle benefits.

aiSummary.title: AI Summary
aiSummary.description: Our AI will generate a professional summary of your property based on all the information you've provided.

review.title: Review & Publish
review.description: Review all your property details before publishing. Make sure everything looks perfect!
